channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: H&S risk- someone has put some fencing in posts only, risk of falling and injury to humans and animals. Fencing, feet and bolts been on the grass since work in car park weeks ago. I assume this was local youths messing about, too heavy to me to take down and make safe on my own, 12th December
item.description:
Grass area at rear of Winchcombe library next to the winchcombe public toilets

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cowl Lane, Winchcombe, Winchcombe

item.title: Large hols, 11th December
item.description:
Outside Australia house on Princess Elizabeth way due to lack of parking and bus stop being so big people park on grass verge and due to how wet it is has caused large holes and paving slabs to be broken

item.title: Large tree stump on grass verge, 11th December
item.description:
The tree was cut down on the grass verge well over a year ago, however the tree stump has never been removed and is still there - over a man hole.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 90, Bournside Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Large (like 2ft diameter) hole in top surface., 11th December

item.title: Loud noise every time driven over, 11th December

item.title: Large deep pot-hole in road, before corner, 11th December
item.description:
Very large and deep pot-hole on outside of road. Pot hole is just before approaching corner, so swerving into opposite lane to avoid is not possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hyde Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 11th December
item.description:
pot hole caused cyclist to go over handle bars -
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadwork signs blocking the pavement on Justica Way, just after the first speed bump., 11th December
item.description:
There is a large group of roadwork signs and materials left on the pavement just after the speed bump on Justica Way. They have been in the same place for around two to three weeks. The items are partially blocking the footpath, forcing wheelchair users and others with limited mobility to move into the road to get past, which creates an unsafe situation. Please could the materials be removed or relocated so that the pavement can be used safely again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Jasmin Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant dog fouling, 11th December
item.description:
There is an almost daily dog fouling problem along this busy and narrow path. This is frequently used by children and parents from the local school who have to constantly avoid this disgusting hazard. Please do something about this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Back Lane, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Windyridge Road, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham

item.title: Footbridge Rotten, 11th December
